main event: A sighting of an unidentified object described as a bright, fast-moving, elongated object was reported near Jacksonville, Florida on August 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was reported as moving in a northerly direction across the sky., It was observed for approximately 2 minutes before disappearing., No sound was associated with the sighting., The object was estimated to be at a very high altitude., No other witnesses or physical evidence was recovered.
witness description: Mr. John Doe, who observed the object silently moving across the sky.
